title: BWR California Went Full Gravel This Year. Here Are the Bikes Pros Chose to Race It and Why.
content:
After a dozen years of mixed surface “un-road” racing that could be contested on a road bike, last weekend’s edition had a gravel vibe shift.

Read the full article at BWR California Went Full Gravel This Year. Here Are the Bikes Pros Chose to Race It and Why. on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
